alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 1:28PM EDT until May 17 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southern Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 128 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northwest of Monticello, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Fincher, Everett, Newark, Eason and Metcalf. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
